EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_ Cloud Native Java Workshop_NYC_Q415.Follow Up Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending the Cloud Native Workshop in New York on December 16, 2015. We hope the event met your expectations and the hands-on workshop provided you with new knowledge on Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring. Access to the labs and technical content is located here <[[https://github.com/joshlong/cloud-native-workshop/blob/1day/README.md#setup]]>.
Contact us <[[mailto:kbastani@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team. Learn how to become Cloud Native today!
Thank you again for joining us! For upcoming events visit us at Pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]> and select the events tab. We look forward to seeing you soon!
The Pivotal Team
